definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Titanium dioxide-coated mica nacreous pigment is preparated by a new method.
sentences.chinese: 本文用新工艺制备了珠光云母钛。

sentences.english: Biotite is a subordinate constituent of the mafic and ultramafic rocks generally.
sentences.chinese: 黑云母一般是镁铁质及超镁铁质岩石中的次要成分。

sentences.english: The significance of K-feldspar on the supplying and transformation of K was much minor to that of mica.
sentences.chinese: 含钾长石在钾素供应及转化上的意义低于云母。

sentences.english: Two mica schists are considered to be the source bed and host rock of gold.
sentences.chinese: 二云母片岩不仅是矿源层，而且还是赋矿围岩。

sentences.english: Several kinds of preparing processes of the titania coated mica based nacreous pigment are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 制备出金红石型钛含量较高的云母钛珠光颜料。

sentences.english: Extracting lithium from lepidolite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了从锂云母中提取锂的方法。

sentences.english: The Xiaobaishitou biotite-granite pluton is situated in the southeastern margin of the central Tian Shan block.
sentences.chinese: 小白石头黑云母花岗岩位于中天山地块东部南缘。

sentences.english: Valueof sericite ore is high by mineral seperation.
sentences.chinese: 分选出的绢云母矿物价值高。

sentences.english: The rock mass consists of fresh sericite quartz phyllite or fresh leptynite.
sentences.chinese: 岩体为新鲜绢云母石英千枚岩或新鲜变粒岩。

sentences.english: Eventually, the relative position between mica-slot's center line and cutter is gotten.
sentences.chinese: 最终得到云母槽中心线与刀具的相对位置。

sentences.english: The factors influencing the content of hydrous micas were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明母质是影响粘粒云母含量的主要因素。

sentences.english: The mica shall be used for main insulating material.
sentences.chinese: 主要绝缘材料应采用云母。

sentences.english: It is expected that there exists good ore-forming potential in silicified and chloritized zones in lower part of this porphyry.
sentences.chinese: 预测斑岩体下部硅化绢云母化带具有较好的成矿前景。

sentences.english: An energy level diagram of autunite is presented from the experimental results.
sentences.chinese: 根据实验结果，给出了钙铀云母的能级跃迁图。

sentences.english: Drying is one of the key process for producing sericite.
sentences.chinese: 干燥是绢云母生产的关键工艺之一。

definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
